snippet.title: 2014 WGC-Accenture Match Play results and bracket: Rory McIlroy sent packing, Jordan Spieth rolls
snippet.description:
2014 WGC-Accenture Match Play results and bracket: Rory McIlroy sent packing, Jordan Spieth rolls by Brendan Porath on Feb 20 2014, 7:16p
The sweet 16 is set in Tucson, where all four No. 1 seeds are gone and Friday's third round will have a distinct American flavor.

snippet.title: Lions vs. Packers 2012 game preview: Scuffling Detroit visits division-leading Green Bay on Sunday night
snippet.description:
Lions vs. Packers 2012 game preview: Scuffling Detroit visits division-leading Green Bay on Sunday night by Griffin Gotta on Dec 9 2012, 10:06a
The Packers have a huge showdown with the Bears looming next week, but will need to focus on the Detroit Lions, a team desperate for a win, on Sunday night in Lambeau Field.
